appinfo_list.value: Bombay Play - Tile and Block Number Puzzles

app_descript:
Brief: Embark on a riveting block puzzle adventure with "Block Heads: Duel puzzle games." This innovative offering from Bombay Play combines the lure of block puzzles with the cerebral rigor of Sudoku, wrapped in a whimsical Tetris twist. Go head-to-head in action-packed PvP duels, harnessing logic and strategy to outplay your rivals in a battle of wits and reflexes.

  • üèÜ Trophy Rewards: Earn shiny trophies for victories and unlock advanced arenas for greater challenges üèÖ.
